attributes.action: For the purposes of the smooth running of the House, we propose that after winning an election: 1) The current prime minister seeks counsel from the former prime minister, 2) This counsel should occur over a weekend in Bognor Regis, 3) The erstwhile adversaries should rent a room in a nice boarding house, go for long strolls along the seafront and swap flirtatious glances across a shared candy floss, 4) The prime minister should wear a tutu.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
